data.what_is:
Symplify Communication is an enterprise messaging personalization, multichannel, and marketing automation platform, renowned and appreciated by over 600 global customers in entertainment, iGaming, and e-commerce for its elegance and ease of use. 

The product was designed for the user first to solve the issues that often plague messaging platforms; they can be complicated and challenging to use and implement. 

Symplify Communications provide you:
- Conversion stats on demand
- Onboard customer segments
- One editor for eight channels
- Visual heatmap
- Web push
- Content keeping you at the top of every SMS inbox
- App Push on demand
- and much more.

Used by thousands, to convert billions - contact us for a free demo!
data.product_description: Symplify Communication is the leader in cross-channel marketing automation for marketers and crm teams.Symplify is the cloud service to simplify your vital business needs. Increase your revenue while we decrease your workload. A fully compliant service GDPR compliance, enabling you to stay on the right side of the line with regulation.At Symplify, we empower you as you power up your sales. Our mission is to make sure you get everything you need to take your marketing communication to the next level. That is why we offer Enterprise Service & Support, including; onboarding, technical support, offer product use strategy, and best practices implementation.With a headquarter in Stockholm, Sweden, and offices in Canada, Denmark, Hong Kong, and Malta. Symplify provides cloud solutions for Marketing Automation, CRM & CRO. They are putting 20 years of web experience into making it easier every time for the end-user. Current clients include Klarna, Mr Green, Harper Collins, Danske Bank and Bonnier Publication.

features.name: Data Import & Export Tools
features.content: Ability to input, modify and extract data from the application in bulk through a structured file.

features.name: Integration APIs
features.content: Application Programming Interface - Specification for how the application communicates with other software.  API's typically enable integration of data, logic, objects, etc with other software applications.

features.name: Breadth of Partner Applications
features.content: To what extent are there partner applications readily available for integrating into this product?  Partner applications typically provide complementary, best of breed functionality not offered natively in this product.

features.name: Customization
features.content: System provides sufficient customization to meet business requirements

features.name: Workflow Capability
features.content: Automates a process that requires a series of steps that typically require intervention by a several different users.  Administrators can write rules to determine who and when a user needs to complete a step.  Also includes notification of users when they need to take action.

features.name: User, Role, and Access Management
features.content: Grant access to select data, features, objects, etc. based on the users, user role, groups, etc.

features.name: Internationalization
features.content: Enables users to view and transact business with the same content in multiple languages and currencies.

features.name: Sandbox / Test Environments
features.content: Allows administrators to easily develop and test changes to the CRM deployment.  After changes are made admins can easily migrate the changes into the "live" or "production" environment.

features.name: Performance and Reliability
features.content: Software is consistently available (uptime) and allows users to complete tasks quickly because they are not waiting for the software to respond to an action they took.

features.name: Output Document Generation
features.content: Allows adminstrators to create templates that enable users to quickly generate dynamic documents in various formats based on the data stored in the application.

features.name: Building and Personalizing Emails
features.content: Based on 12 Symplify Communication reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create and design emails with an editor; manage templates; personalize dynamically

features.name: Sending Outbound Emails
features.content: Based on 12 Symplify Communication reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Create targeted lists, schedule and manage bulk email sending.

features.name: Manage Email Deliverability
features.content: Based on 12 Symplify Communication reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Ensure inbox delivery. Includes opt-in management, bounce handling, unsubscribe processing, suppression lists, email preview, spam checking, link validation, and delivery monitoring.

features.name: Automated Email Responses
features.content: Based on 10 Symplify Communication reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Set up automated nurturing emails based on events, online activities, and lead scores

features.name: Landing Pages and Forms
features.content: Build customized landing pages and lead capture forms for specific marketing campaigns to maximize conversion and to capture the right qualifying information.

features.name: Dynamic Content
features.content: Dynamically customize emails, forms, and landing pages for specific segments of customers and prospects.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test alternate versions of emails, landing pages, and forms. Learn what works, maximize response rates, and increase conversion.

features.name: Mobile Optimized
features.content: Support mobile-optimized emails, online forms, and landing pages.

features.name: Search Tracking and Optimization
features.content: Track performance of keywords and links in major search engines.  Measure search rankings and performance.  Improve page-level SEO with tools to diagnose and improve page performance.  Integrate with Google AdWords.

features.name: Marketing Lead Database
features.content: A marketing lead database is the system of record for your most important marketing asset: your leads and contacts. Includes a view of all marketing interactions between each prospect and your company, including website visits, email clicks, scoring changes, and data updates/history.

features.name: Data Quality Management
features.content: Based on 10 Symplify Communication reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Data quality consists of deduplication, cleansing, and appending your marketing database.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Based on 11 Symplify Communication reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Segment your database and build list of target leads and contacts.  Filter on demographic and company attributes (title, company size, location) as well as behavioral filters and CRM information.

features.name: Lead Scoring and Grading
features.content: Automatically qualify and score leads based on demographics as well as prospect online behaviors, including recency and frequency. Assign your own weights to determine lead scores for prioritization.

features.name: Lead Nurturing
features.content: Automate drip marketing campaigns that send relevant messages over time, based on prospect behaviors and pre-defined campaign steps.

features.name: Online Behavior Tracking
features.content: Track which emails a prospect opens and clicks, what web-pages they visit, what keywords they use, even what they say on social networks.

features.name: Automated Alerts and Tasks
features.content: Create tasks automatically and provide real-time sales alerts over email, RSS or mobile device.

features.name: CRM Lead Integration
features.content: Sync lead, contact, account, and opportunity information with your CRM system.

features.name: Program ManagementView full feature definition
features.content: Manage marketing campaigns and programs across multiple channels, including online ads, video campaigns, mobile, virtual events, and social media. Create and optimize program assets such as landing pages, emails, campaigns, and lists. Track program objectives, results, and costs to assess the program ROI.

features.name: Event / Webinar Marketing
features.content: Streamline the entire event process, including personalized invitations, registration, reminders, and post-event follow-up.  Integrate with online meeting tools like WebEx, Adobe Connect, GoToWebinar.

features.name: Calendaring
features.content: Maintain a marketing calendar across multiple groups. Manage the calendar for the entire marketing department, from promotions to content to PR.

features.name: Budgeting
features.content: Manage all aspects of marketing investments, including assigning top-down budgets to various groups and divisions, planning marketing spending across programs, tracking open-to-spend, ensuring budget compliance, coordinating work-flows and permissions, and reconciling plans with actual invoices.

features.name: Social Listening
features.content: Monitor what leads and contacts say on sites such as Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, LinkedIn, blogs, and online communities.  Incorporate into your lead and customer DB and use social insights to segment prospects.  Trigger campaigns, and update lead scores.

features.name: Social Sharing
features.content: Add intelligent social share buttons to your campaigns and content.  Track who is sharing your content and driving conversions.

features.name: Social Campaigns
features.content: Schedule automated posts to one or more social accounts; use or integrate with URL shortening services; and measure likes, comments, replies, and retweets.

features.name: Social Media Engagement
features.content: Social apps including polls, sweepstakes, and referral programs can enhance audience engagement.  Include these on your website, landing pages, Facebook pages, and emails.

features.name: Social Media Advertising
features.content: Amplify brand and community stories; Reach customers by social profile and activity; Optimize social ad campaigns in real-time

features.name: Basic Reporting
features.content: Based on 12 Symplify Communication reviews and verified by the G2 Product R&D team. Access pre-built and custom reports and dashboards to measure leads by source/campaign/month, email performance, landing page performance, and web and social activity. Create report subscriptions that can automatically send updates to your team and executives.

features.name: Web Analytics
features.content: Track which pages prospects and customers visit and how often they come back.  Capture the history in database for lead scoring and sales intelligence. Use anonymous company look-up to identify anonymous visitors.  Send alerts to sales reps of which of their prospects and customers web activity.

features.name: ROI Analytics
features.content: Measure leads, prospects generated, pipeline, revenue, investment, and ROI by marketing channel or program. The result is that you can see which marketing investments are generating the greatest return and get visibility into how marketing budget should be allocated going forward.

features.name: Revenue Analytics
features.content: Analyze how leads flow through the funnel by measuring stage to stage conversion rates and velocity.  Allocate pipeline and revenue credit among all the marketing activities that have successfully touched an opportunity as it moves through the pipeline.

features.name: SEO / Keyword Analytics
features.content: Monitor and track how you rank for relevant keywords on major search engines and compare your overall performance to competitors.

features.name: Customize
features.content: Allow users to customize their messages.

features.name: Scheduling
features.content: Schedule push notifications to be delivered at a specific date and time, or set an expiration for time-bound messages

features.name: Retarget
features.content: Retarget your messages based on previous user engagement.

features.name: Segmentation
features.content: Segment audience based on device type, location, demographics, customer behavior, etc.

features.name: Triggered Notifications
features.content: Automate notifications based on user behavior

features.name: Campaign Performance
features.content: Track and report on performance metrics and conversions

features.name: Audience Insights
features.content: Report on audience demographics and engagement

features.name: Text and Themes
features.content: Allow users to edit text and themes on email templates

features.name: Stock Images
features.content: Provide a library of stock images to use for emails

features.name: Proofing
features.content: Offer email proofing capabilities

features.name: Mobile Responsive
features.content: Provide mobile responsive email templates

features.name: Pre-Made
features.content: Offer pre-made email templates

features.name: Build
features.content: Allow users to create their own email templates

features.name: Analytics
features.content: Provide analytics reporting so that users can see how their campaigns perform

features.name: Issues
features.content: Allow for users to identify potential issues that would stop their emails from sending

features.name: Integrations
features.content: Integrate with email software or email marketing and marketing automation platforms

features.name: Shareable Link
features.content: Ability to share email templates via a link to collect feedback on the created emails easily

features.name: A/B Testing
features.content: Test variations of a push notification on a portion of users and track conversions

features.name: Personalization
features.content: Personalize messages with contextual data such as customer names or product recommendations

features.name: Rich Notifications
features.content: Enhance messages with images, emojis, animated gifs, or videos

features.name: Integrations
features.content: Integrate with third-party marketing or e-commerce software

features.name: Dynamic Segmentation
features.content: Provides users the ability to dynamically segment their users based on varying criteria (i.e. email opens, product features, etc.).

features.name: Journey Optimization
features.content: Automates the testing and optimization of customer-facing messaging and campaigns.

features.name: Journey Reporting
features.content: Ability to uncover and visualize how users move through your website, marketing campaigns, and product(s).

features.name: Trends Reporting
features.content: Ability to measure product usage by feature, campaign performance by source, and other trending metrics.

features.name: Dashboards
features.content: Provides dashboards to combine and visualize quantitative and qualitive customer journey data.

features.name: Advanced Data Filtering
features.content: Provides advanced data filtering capabilities to help users drill down, sort, filter, aggregate, and group customer journey data.

features.name: Journey Mapping
features.content: Ability to create visualizations or maps of past, current, or future customer journeys based on behavioral data.

features.name: Integrations
features.content: Integrates with additional marketing analytics and other marketing, sales, and e-commerce-related software to provide one source of truth for customer journey analytics.

features.name: Automated Alerts
features.content: Provides the ability to setup automated alerts to drive targeted actions and customer experience improvements.

I am also extremely happy with the excellent service provided whenever we need it.

We provide personalized and targeted offers for our customers using Symplify for all our emails and SMS. Using the Symplify Journey A/B testing helps us optimize our offers.

initial_reviews.review_title: Much like your favorite rucksack, Symplify's exterior hides a robust system that's easy to dig into.
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Symplify Communication?
The 'skins' and 'boilerplates' section and their integration with project folders. Whilst oddly named, this section is by far one of the best template management and editing features I have used. Thanks to how convenient it is after set up, we no longer need to jump into hundreds of onboarding emails to make changes and amendments.  The template editor itself is quite robust but you wouldn't think that on first glance as they do a great job at keeping it simple - but believe me when I say there is a lot to dig into for those who like to squeeze every last drop out of this product.

What do you dislike about Symplify Communication?
The permission groups and user account section could use an overhaul. Presently there's a lot of features which require setting an agent as an admin in order to be able to use key areas of the product. I'd like for a better user management system overall as in this one area I am reliant on a lot of manual work to maintain our user access. There's a lot to be desired in this section of the product but I am confident they'll get around to it soon.

What problems is Symplify Communication solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've gone all in with Symplify and have just under a 100 employees actively using the product on a daily basis. It's helped us greatly cut down the time it takes to get our marketing written, proof read, tested and delivered to our customer inboxes. We're constantly working alongside Symplify to squeeze more out of it's Journey planner, further integrating it with our in-house tools. We're still solving some kinks out however I am fully confident we'll resolve these challenges in due course. I'd say overall I am very satisfied with the product and would highly recommend.

review_question_answers.question: What do you like best about Symplify Communication?
review_question_answers.answer: The 'skins' and 'boilerplates' section and their integration with project folders. Whilst oddly named, this section is by far one of the best template management and editing features I have used. Thanks to how convenient it is after set up, we no longer need to jump into hundreds of onboarding emails to make changes and amendments.  The template editor itself is quite robust but you wouldn't think that on first glance as they do a great job at keeping it simple - but believe me when I say there is a lot to dig into for those who like to squeeze every last drop out of this product.

review_question_answers.question: What do you dislike about Symplify Communication?
review_question_answers.answer: The permission groups and user account section could use an overhaul. Presently there's a lot of features which require setting an agent as an admin in order to be able to use key areas of the product. I'd like for a better user management system overall as in this one area I am reliant on a lot of manual work to maintain our user access. There's a lot to be desired in this section of the product but I am confident they'll get around to it soon.

review_question_answers.question: What problems is Symplify Communication solving and how is that benefiting you?
review_question_answers.answer: We've gone all in with Symplify and have just under a 100 employees actively using the product on a daily basis. It's helped us greatly cut down the time it takes to get our marketing written, proof read, tested and delivered to our customer inboxes. We're constantly working alongside Symplify to squeeze more out of it's Journey planner, further integrating it with our in-house tools. We're still solving some kinks out however I am fully confident we'll resolve these challenges in due course. I'd say overall I am very satisfied with the product and would highly recommend.

initial_reviews.review_title: The best Marketing automation and CRM tool available
initial_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Symplify Communication?
I have previously used Silverpop, Sendgrid, Salesforce and Selligent. They all were great, but lacked the ease-of-use and UX part that Symplify really has nailed down. Symplify has made it possible to manage full customer lifecycles and marketing automation without the need for big CRM teams.

Very simple to learn without any prior crm, technical or html knowledge. Great UX with logical steps and everything easy to find. The Expertise pages give full guidance on everything with simple step-by-step and video instructions.

The Symplify Email editor is by far the best, you can drag and drop and build a beautiful email in just minutes.

What do you dislike about Symplify Communication?
There is nothing I dislike with Symplify.

What problems is Symplify Communication solving and how is that benefiting you?
In Gaming there is a lot of movement within teams, constant promotions and new junior executives starting. With Symplify I have solved the problem of having to constantly train and onboard new executives in the use of complex crm tools. With Symplify they learn quickly and can jump straight in. I had a girl starting in my team with no previous crm knowledge at all and she was building emails, segments and automations in just a few days!

Very simple to learn without any prior crm, technical or html knowledge. Great UX with logical steps and everything easy to find. The Expertise pages give full guidance on everything with simple step-by-step and video instructions.

The Symplify Email editor is by far the best, you can drag and drop and build a beautiful email in just minutes.

all_reviews.review_title: Much like your favorite rucksack, Symplify's exterior hides a robust system that's easy to dig into.
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Symplify Communication?
The 'skins' and 'boilerplates' section and their integration with project folders. Whilst oddly named, this section is by far one of the best template management and editing features I have used. Thanks to how convenient it is after set up, we no longer need to jump into hundreds of onboarding emails to make changes and amendments.  The template editor itself is quite robust but you wouldn't think that on first glance as they do a great job at keeping it simple - but believe me when I say there is a lot to dig into for those who like to squeeze every last drop out of this product.

What do you dislike about Symplify Communication?
The permission groups and user account section could use an overhaul. Presently there's a lot of features which require setting an agent as an admin in order to be able to use key areas of the product. I'd like for a better user management system overall as in this one area I am reliant on a lot of manual work to maintain our user access. There's a lot to be desired in this section of the product but I am confident they'll get around to it soon.

What problems is Symplify Communication solving and how is that benefiting you?
We've gone all in with Symplify and have just under a 100 employees actively using the product on a daily basis. It's helped us greatly cut down the time it takes to get our marketing written, proof read, tested and delivered to our customer inboxes. We're constantly working alongside Symplify to squeeze more out of it's Journey planner, further integrating it with our in-house tools. We're still solving some kinks out however I am fully confident we'll resolve these challenges in due course. I'd say overall I am very satisfied with the product and would highly recommend.

I have previously used Silverpop, Sendgrid, Salesforce and Selligent. They all were great, but lacked the ease-of-use and UX part that Symplify really has nailed down. Symplify has made it possible to manage full customer lifecycles and marketing automation without the need for big CRM teams.

Very simple to learn without any prior crm, technical or html knowledge. Great UX with logical steps and everything easy to find. The Expertise pages give full guidance on everything with simple step-by-step and video instructions.

The Symplify Email editor is by far the best, you can drag and drop and build a beautiful email in just minutes.

What do you dislike about Symplify Communication?
There is nothing I dislike with Symplify.

What problems is Symplify Communication solving and how is that benefiting you?
In Gaming there is a lot of movement within teams, constant promotions and new junior executives starting. With Symplify I have solved the problem of having to constantly train and onboard new executives in the use of complex crm tools. With Symplify they learn quickly and can jump straight in. I had a girl starting in my team with no previous crm knowledge at all and she was building emails, segments and automations in just a few days!

all_reviews.review_title: Nouvelle utilisatrice
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Symplify Communication?
J'aime la structure de chaque template, la possibilite de mettre plusieurs liens et l'option test. Cela nous donne un bon apercu avant de l'envoyer.

What do you dislike about Symplify Communication?
Je n'aime pas  la facon comment on doit mettre a jour un seul courriel. Notre contexte (plusieurs magasins qui changent de numero s'ils sont vendus) nous enleve beaucoup de temps a faire cela. Une autre chose, les couleurs sont difficiles a changer si on copie un exemple d'une infolettre envoyee auparavant.
Derniere chose, j'aurai aime avoir un cahier avec les notions de base ou bien des Capsules video pour apprendre cela. J'ai recu les videos enregistres de la personne qui occupait mon poste avant, mais ca serait mieux si on peut partir de 0 avec quelques formation de base.

What problems is Symplify Communication solving and how is that benefiting you?
Bientot, je ferai une liste a jour avec tous les magasins. Je ferai les bonne segmentation pour avoir plus de consultation d'infolettre.

all_reviews.review_title: Very complete platform once you learn to use it
all_reviews.review_content:
What do you like best about Symplify Communication?
I like the fact that there are a great number of options to make  and send newsletter. Patterns are nicely built up and you can navigate through them easily and add elements (paragraphs, images, titles..).
Symplify's team is very reactive and will always provide help when needed.

What do you dislike about Symplify Communication?
The platform design could be improved so that it facilitates UX.
Also, it is a shame that we do not have more choices regarding typos.
Finally, could we be able to create recipients lists ourselves ?

What problems is Symplify Communication solving and how is that benefiting you?
A huge benefit is being able to create segments so that we can sort out recipients and produce tergeted content. The number of filters for segments is quite interesting.
